Chinyere Yvonne Okoro bụ onye Ghana na Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri
Amụrụ ya nye nna Nigeria na nne Ghana, Yvonne Okoro sitere na agbụrụ a gwakọritara wee kpọọ onwe ya onye Africa

Yvonne Okoro sitere na Koforidua na Eastern Parts nke Ghana Ọ natara ihe nrite nke Ghana Movie Awards Best Actress Award na 2010  a họpụtakwara ya maka Africa Movie Academy Awards Best Actress ugboro abụọ n'usoro n'afọ 2011 na 2012 maka ihe nkiri ya Pool Party na Single Six
Ọ natakwara onyinye nturu ugo Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Award  ọzọ kwa, n'afọ 2012, o nwetara onyinye nkwanye ugwu dị egwu na Nigeria Excellence Awards
A mụrụ ya nye nne onye Ghana ebe nna ya bu kwa onye Naijiria
Yvonne Okoro sitere n'agbụrụ agwakọtara agwakọta nke mere ọ ji akpọ onwe ya onye Africa
O si n'ezinaụlọ buru ibu, ọ bụ nwa mbụ nke nne ya na nwa nke ise n'ime ụmụnne ya niile
Site na nwata, o gosipụtara ọchịchọ ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Achimota Preparatory School, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Lincoln Community School wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Faith Montessori
Ọ gara n'ihu na Mfantsiman Girls Secondary School mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Ghana, Legon ebe ọ mere Bachelor of Arts, na-ejikọta Bekee na linguistics
N'ikpeazụ, ọ nọ na Universite de Nantes dị na France iji mụọ Press Civilization, Drama na Marketing
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Sticking to the Promise, ihe nkiri e mere n'afọ 2002 nke onye Naijiria na-emepụta ihe nkiri bụ Theo Akatugba mere, obere oge ka ọ guchara agụmakwụkwọ ụlọakwụkwọ School
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị egwu n'usoro ihe nkiri Tentacles nke otu onye nrụpụta maka Point Blank Media Concepts.
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye ngosiputa nke Dining with Cooks and Braggarts
Cooks na Braggarts bụ ihe ngosi nri a ma ama nke na-egosi ndị ama ama ka ha tinye aka n'otú ha si esi nri kacha amasị ha mgbe ha na-ekwu maka isiokwu dị iche iche
O mere ka ụlọ ọrụ redio Peace FM nke Accra mara na ya nwere ụlọ ọrụ Desamour Company Limited nke ya
N'afọ 2019, o nyere ndị Black Queens nke Ghana onyinye tupu asọmpi WAFA 2019
Na mbido 2020, o nyekwaara ihe ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ ọgwụ ebe a na-amụ nwa nke Korle bu Teaching Hospital
